critique: The document expresses concern about the loss of life and economic burden due to not wearing seatbelts. It aims to reduce suffering and costs. There is a sense of responsibility and determination to improve safety. It does not express joy, but it does express sadness and concern. There is no expression of anger. There is a sense of fear of the consequences of not wearing seatbelts. There is no expression of disgust. There is no expression of surprise.
